بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم

This is a MWE of a Quarto book that in left-to-right text (English), with portions of 
right-to-left text (Arabic) in it. Examples:

1. The [basmalah]{.trn2} above.
2. This inline text: [العربية]{.ar}

To learn how to type Arabic text and its transcription/transliteration see the next chapter @sec-introduction.

The source code for this book can be found here: https://github.com/adamiturabi/quarto-arabic-mwe

To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.
